postText: Just had the most amazing meal at a new restaurant in town!

comments.commentText: Wow, that looks delicious! What restaurant did you go to?
I've been wanting to try that place. How was the service?

postText: Just finished reading a great book - highly recommend it!

comments.commentText: What book was it? I'm always looking for something new to read.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll add it to my reading list.
